posts.post_content:
Hello everyone. I acquired a group of t 206's   The Seymour portait is sold . I have dropped the prices and am open to offers on the group or individually. Please look at the scans and if you have any questions please feel free to ask. Payment by check or paypal gift. Thank you

Seymour Batting PSA 4 50.00
Lake PSA 4.5 60.00
Warhop PSA 4 50.00
Wilson PSA 4 50.00
Tannehil (Chi. L. Tannehill) 55.00

Hey, I'll take the Cy Seymour portrait.  Sent pm.  Thanks.

Jim
